title: Linear Function Calculation
description:
F_LIN = A*X + B)
The function F_LIN returns the Y value of a linear equation.
F_LIN = A*X + B
name: F_LIN

input.name: X
input.description: The independent variable for the linear equation.

input.name: A
input.description: The coefficient representing the slope of the linear function.

input.name: B
input.description: The constant term that represents the y-intercept of the linear function.

return_value.description: The result of the linear function calculation, which is the value of A * X + B.
